name: G'srulesoffunny
0:
”Alexa, g's rules.”
”Alexa, open g's rules and tell me what's funny.”
”Alexa, open g's rules and tell me about comedy.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: g's rules
des: Want to be funnier? Here's how, according to G (who asked to remain nameless to minimize his social-media footprint, which is completely ridiculous and, unsurprisingly, funny). Learn how he does it so you can, too.
